conclusion: Initial cruising speed before the toll booth: v₀ = 30 m/s
Required speed while passing the booth: v₁ = 5 m/s
Distance that must be covered at the constant low speed: d = 10 m
Magnitude of (de-)acceleration for braking and re-acceleration: a = 1 m/s²
Braking distance s₁ calculated using v² = u² + 2as with a = −1 m/s², u = v₀, v = v₁
Re-acceleration distance s₂ calculated using v² = u² + 2as with a = +1 m/s², u = 5 m/s, v = 30 m/s
Low-speed constant-velocity distance given directly: d = 10 m
Total displacement S = s₁ + d + s₂ = 885 m
The car travels a total displacement of 885 m while it decelerates, passes the ETC lane, and accelerates back to its normal cruising speed.
